title: Where my heart lies

abstract: 'I had the best childhood growing up in the bush.'
description: Vicki Baker, mother of three, grew up in the bush but eventually had to move to town to find employment. She recalls her childhood days of family and the freedom of running through the bush with the wind in her hair and not a care in the world.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001246; Crossenvale stories : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2007
